reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress has a perfect fit, with one noting it hits at the shin length, and appreciate its appearance, with one mentioning the gold accent at the waist.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: Gorgeous dress. Fits great, comfortable. Great dress especially for the price. Read more
items.author: Joyce Thompson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I bought a medium and it fit true to size üòçlove it
items.body: Beautiful it fits so well üëç Love the color, the fit and how it made me look. Read more
items.author: Patricia L. Brewster

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress.
items.body: The quality of this dress is excellent. My problem was with the fit. I'm 5'1, 113#, with a 34D bust. I got a larger size because of the bust measurement, but the dress ended up too large in the skirt portion and too long, The dress is beautiful on my friend, which is why I purchased it in the first place. However, it went down to my ankles. The top fit, though! Read more
items.author: susan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great party dress
items.body: I wore this to my company‚Äôs Christmas party. I received tons of compliments! Sizing is accurate, material is good quality, not too thick. Very happy with this dress. Read more
items.author: Cameron H.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: Love the fit and feel of this dress. Received lots of compliments. Read more
items.author: Theresy Yosef

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sizing is correct
items.body: This dress is very slender using. It fits beautifully and looks like a much more expensive dress. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile
items.body: Great color. Can dress it up or down. Got a peacock pin that looks great on it. Comfortable not clingy for a sweater dress. Read more

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Bodycon Long Sleeve Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Bodycon Long Sleeve Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Light Blue, Light Brown, Red, Brown, Pink, Beige, Burgundy, Army Green, Black, Navy Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
